member.name: T:KnowledgeBase.Crytography.Base64.Base64Algorithm
member.summary: This is the Base64 algorithm implementation with source code
member.remarks: Base64 is a 6-bits based encoding method, since 64 == 2^6, so it is a 6 bit based encoding, since each 6-bit will occupied as an independent 8-bit byte, the encoded byte length will be 4/3 times than the original byte length

member.name: M:KnowledgeBase.Crytography.Base64.Base64Algorithm.Base64Encoding(System.Byte[])
member.remarks: Base64 encoding is to transfer 8-bit bytes array to 6-bit bytes array, so every 3 8-bit bytes will be transfered to 4 6-bit blocks
member.param: The un-encoded byte array of the object
member.returns: a character array of Base64 encoded object

member.name: M:KnowledgeBase.Crytography.Base64.Base64Algorithm.Base64Decoding(System.Char[])
member.remarks: Base64 decoding is to transfer 6-bit bytes array back to 8-bit bytes array, so every 4 6-bit block will be transfered to 3 8-bit bytes
member.returns: The original un-encoded object byte array

member.name: M:KnowledgeBase.Crytography.Base64.Base64Algorithm.SixBitToChar(System.Byte)
member.summary: Lookup Base64 character codes based on 6-bit value

member.name: M:KnowledgeBase.Crytography.Base64.Base64Algorithm.CharToSixBit(System.Char)
member.summary: Covert Base64 character code back to a 8-bit byte (since it's Base64 char so only has 6-bit valid information)
